alert.note: Alert for Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:33PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rock County through 700 PM CDT... At 632 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Bassett, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pony Lake. This includes Highway 183 between mile markers 170 and 179. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.
